name: HELLcopter!
description:
HELLcopter!

Take the Highway to the danger zone in the HELLCopter!  

Liberate the island nation of Alruco from its brutal dictator by destroying everything that stands in your way.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Fly

X - Machine Gun 
Z - Rocket

Enemies

 Gun Boat -- These deadly gunships fire high velocity shells in rapid fire 

 Gun Tank -- Gun tanks will take you down with their heavy machine guns

SAM Boat -- These anti-aircraft boats fire missiles that will quickly ruin your day

SAM Tank -- Nothing is more dangerous in the air than anti-aircraft missiles!

Pick-ups

Health -- Repair damage 

Ammo Crate -- Replenish rockets and machine gun rounds

Fuel Barrel -- Refuel the chopper

Made for the 2017 LOWREZJAM

A collaboration between abznak and gorebang
